translated: Longshu's Expanded Pure Land Writings, Scroll 8
Written by Wang Rixiu, a Jinshi from the Imperial University
Although the Pure Land is a million worlds away from here, in terms of its traces, it is not
superior in being far away.
However, the wisdom nature of the Buddha encompasses the empty space and worlds.
Therefore, it is present everywhere.
Thus, all sentient beings, in raising their intentions and moving their steps,
are all within the Buddha's nature.
With utmost sincerity and earnestness,
there is nothing that does not manifest a response.
Therefore, this scroll describes the responsive manifestations in the present world.

Chen Qi's Remembrance of Buddhahood and Repelling Ghosts Chen Qi of Wangjiang in the same prefecture once falsely killed a person.
Later he saw ghosts appear.
Qi was terrified.
He urgently recited Amitabha Buddha.
The ghosts did not dare to approach.
Qi continued to recite the Buddha's name.
The ghosts finally disappeared.
Later he always recited the Buddha's name.
He sat and transformed at the end of his life.
Half a year later, he attached himself to the daughter of his own family named Miaoguang and said:
Because I recited Amitabha Buddha,
I have already been reborn in the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss.
His movements and speech were just as they were in his lifetime.
Relatives and acquaintances all came to see him.
After two or three days, the family said:
It's a pity that when you were alive,
you never passed on the joyful spirit to make offerings.
Qi then appeared.
He was just as he was in his lifetime.
Only his face had a slight color.
It is said that in the West, people live long and do not age.
Their heads are like the Buddha's coiled hair.
It is said that this is the gradual attainment of Buddhahood.
Zhou Xianshu, a scholar from Wangjiang, told me this.
Zou Binwang's Dream of Reciting the Buddha's Name Zou Binwang's Dream of Reciting the Buddha's Name I once advised Zou Binwang, a scholar from Zhenjiang,
to talk about the Western Paradise.
And said:
If you don't have time,
just join your palms in the morning,
and recite 'Namo Amitabha Buddha' ten times facing west, that will also work.
Zou Binwang believed it.
That night he had a dream.
He was going to see a magistrate with a scholar.
In his fear, he recited Amitabha Buddha ten times and then woke up.
Isn't this the Buddha using this to strengthen his faith?

Zhang Jizu Reciting the Buddha's Name to Recommend the Deceased Zhang Jizu Reciting the Buddha's Name to Recommend the Deceased I once talked about the Western Paradise with Zhang Jizu, a scholar from Zhenjiang.
Jizu believed it.
His wet nurse died many times.
To chant the name of Amitabha Buddha for the sake of the deceased.
One night he dreamed of his wet nurse.
Borrowing the back of the child's clothes to thank Ji Zu and bid farewell.
This is the effect of chanting the Buddha's name to help the deceased.
Liu Huizhong Chanting the Buddha's Name and Sleeping Peacefully Liu Huizhong Chanting the Buddha's Name and Sleeping Peacefully I used to know Liu Zhonghui, a man from Changxing, Huzhou.
He often had nightmares.
I advised him to chant the name of Amitabha Buddha.
Liu Zhonghui sincerely chanted the Buddha's name one hundred and eight times.
That night he finally slept peacefully.
The next day he chanted as before.
From then on he always slept peacefully.
From this we can see that the power of the Buddha is vast and can do anything.
This is what I referred to in the preface as calming the body and mind.
Ruan Sao Chanting the Buddha's Name and Her Eyes Becoming Clear Ruan Sao Chanting the Buddha's Name and Her Eyes Becoming Clear In my home county of Huaining, there was a Ruan Niansan.
His wife suffered from blindness in both eyes.
She always chanted the name of Amitabha Buddha.
She was then able to open her eyes.
I have personally witnessed this.

Yanluo King Encouraging an Old Woman to Chant the Buddha's Name Yanluo King Encouraging an Old Woman to Chant the Buddha's Name An old woman surnamed Jiang from Zhulin Village, Jinan County, Zhenjiang, was over seventy years old.
She died and arrived at the underworld.
Her life was not yet over.
She was to be sent back.
Yanluo King asked her,
Can you recite sutras?
She replied,
I cannot.
The king said,
Since you cannot recite sutras,
just chant the name of Amitabha Buddha.
After releasing her,
the old woman thought,
Yanluo King taught me to chant the Buddha's name.
There is nothing more to doubt.
So she always chanted this Buddha's name.
She lived to be nearly one hundred and twenty years old before passing away.
It is certain that she was born in the Pure Land.
Isn't it because of chanting the Buddha's name that she extended her life?
How long was her life?
The scholar Ruoyan Zhi of Jinan told me this.

Shao the Pacification Commissioner Recites the Buddha's Name and Escapes Disaster Shao the Pacification Commissioner Recites the Buddha's Name and Escapes Disaster Shao Xiong of Jinjiang, styled Xiweng.
When he was a scholar.
He dreamed of arriving at an official residence.
People all called him the Pacification Commissioner.
Xiong was delighted and said.
Isn't it that after I pass the examinations, I will become the Pacification Commissioner?
He went forward and saw an official.
He asked, Do you know the reason why you have not passed the examinations yet?
Xiong replied, I don't know.
He ordered Xiong to go and see.
He saw a large cauldron boiling clams.
Seeing Xiong, it made human sounds and called out Xiong's name.
Xiong then recited the name of Amitabha Buddha.
As soon as he recited it once,
the clams all turned into yellow sparrows and flew away.
Later, Xiong indeed passed the examinations and became the Pacification Commissioner.
From this, we can see that.
Killing life obstructs one's future path.
It is impermissible not to refrain from it.
Moreover, we can see that the Buddha's power is vast.
It is impermissible not to respect it.
Official positions have their own fixed shares.
It cannot be obtained by mere seeking.
Reciting the Buddha's name does not create wind illness. I recently boarded a boat and arrived at Zhenjiang.
The water in the canal was too high to proceed.
So I borrowed four sutras from Jinshan.
They were the Amitabha Sutra.
I wanted to collate and print them for wide distribution.
When I picked up the brush,
my right hand had wind illness.
Its fingers twitched on their own.
It was inconvenient to write.
So I raised my finger
and recited the name of Amitabha Buddha and Guanyin Bodhisattva several times.
I prayed to be cured of the wind illness and to complete the writing of this sutra.
After the prayer, the finger stopped twitching.
And it remained so until the end of the manuscript.
From this I see that the Buddha
and the bodhisattvas are right before my eyes.
It's just that people's faith is not sincere enough.
Reciting the Buddha's name in dreams to escape fear. When I have fear in my dreams,
I recite the name of Amitabha Buddha and Guanyin Bodhisattva.
It is never not immediately peaceful.
Or immediately awakened.
Sufficient to see the Buddha and Bodhisattvas.
The speed of their majestic spiritual power is like this.
But discern the faithful mind.
The response is not ineffective.
There was an old woman who was blind in both eyes.
She had her son lead her.
She always recited AmitÄbha Buddha.
One day she rested under an old house.
The house suddenly collapsed.
The son ran away.
The old woman was underneath.
There were two pieces of wood supporting her above.
She did not die from being crushed.
This is the effect of reciting the Buddha's name.
Mr. Miaoding told me this.
Reciting the Buddha's name cured his gout disease. There was an official named Li Zicheng.
He lived in Suzhou.
He was quite fond of Daoism.
He once studied under me.
The year before last, he suffered from gout for a long time.
He informed me, saying:
But I was afraid that your son Qing would not believe it.
If he believed it, he would certainly follow it.
I then gave him a prescription.
Telling him to recite the name of Amitabha Buddha single-mindedly when taking the medicine.
Son Qing followed it.
On that day, he recovered eight points.
The next day, he did the same and completely recovered.
From then on, Son Qing deeply believed in the Buddhist principles.
Always keeping the Pure Land texts in his sleeves.
Reciting the Buddha's name, even serious illnesses can be cured. The daughter of the Liang family was blind in both eyes.
She recited the name of Amitabha Buddha for three years.
Concentrating her thoughts without interruption.
Her eyes opened wide.
Also, Mrs. Feng recited the Buddha's name.
Her long illness was finally cured.

Dreaming of the Buddha, one can become wise and eloquent. Dreaming of the Buddha, one can become wise and eloquent. Chan Master Huisi of the Sui Dynasty dreamed of Amitabha Buddha speaking Dharma to him.
Afterwards, his wisdom and eloquence surpassed others.
Auspicious signs were not one.
Excerpted from the Records of Rebirth.
Reciting the Buddha's name to cure illness and recover. Reciting the Buddha's name to cure illness and recover. In recent years, a monk in Suzhou always recited Amitabha Buddha.
He treated people's illnesses.
Those who were sick asked him to go and they always recovered.
The people of Suzhou all talked about it.
Reciting the Buddha's name, the grandson escapes danger Reciting the Buddha's name, the grandson escapes danger There was an old man in a village in my hometown.
Whenever something happened,
he would join his palms together at his forehead
and recite Amitabha Buddha.
His grandson was only two or three years old.
He once followed his mother to the fields.
Suddenly he was lost.
The old man searched for him but could not find him.
After several days, someone told him,
He is outside the creek.
Sure enough, he found him.
He saw footprints
all over the sandbar.
The creek was very deep.
He did not know how the child had crossed.
Moreover, the child was unharmed after a long time.
People considered it to be the sincerity of his ancestor, moved by Amitabha Buddha.
